snippet: The immigration justice system inflicts arbitrary cruelty when it holds detainees in solitary confinement as punishment for civil violations.
abstract: Editorial expresses dismay at frequency with which illegal immigrants are subjected to solitary confinement, extreme form of punishment that risks causing severe mental damage; contends if Janet Napolitano, homeland security secretary, does not stop practice, Congress should step in.
lead_paragraph: The immigration justice system inflicts arbitrary cruelty when it holds detainees in solitary confinement as punishment for civil violations.
